title.value: Управление инновационной деятельностью на предприятиях агросервиса

person.name: Timaev, A.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph presents theoretical foundations of innovation management in the sphere of agricultural service. Essence, maintenance and management of innovation activity is analyzed; theoretical foundations of innovation management are substantiated; foreign experience and stages of development of the theory of innovation management is evaluated; current status and management of innovation in enterprises of agricultural services is researched. Methodology for evaluation of the effectiveness of innovation and its potential on agricultural service companies is suggested; organization and management of innovative activity of enterprises of agricultural services (for example, the holding 'Agromashservice') is analyzed. Effectiveness of innovation management and assessment of its potential for agro enterprises (on the example of the holding 'Agromashservice') is investigated. Organizational and economic mechanism of innovation management (in agricultural service enterprises) along with mechanism of organizational management of innovation activity is described. Methods of assessing the efficiency and competitiveness of innovative projects, technique of stimulating investment and creating the optimal portfolio of innovative projects are developed and offered.
